casebody.data:
MEEKS et al., Respondent, v. SIMON, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 8, 1893.) Action by William F. Meeks against Lewis Simon.

Argued before BOOKSTAYER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

G. C. Comstock, for appellant. S. Johnson, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion to direct Marshall to return amount collected granted. See 21 N. Y. Supp. 1004.
